Multivariate Normal¶

pdf – Log of the probability density function evaluated at x

pdf(mean, cov)[source]¶

Multivariate normal probability density function. :param x: Quantiles, with the last axis of x denoting the components. :type x: array_like

Returns

pdf – Probability density function evaluated at x
